I found an interesting way to cheat on money with slimes.  Meanwhile, 
I'm putting together an unstoppable team, while refining my bonus 
scenario to yield just the right amount of cash.  The strength level 
of each member is determined by the point where the buying strength is 
free. Aside from my slime, I'm starting to see a pattern of where the 
stats are free for strength: around the number 25625.  
(Hypothetically, aside from significant raising of funds, nobody 
should be buying stats that are above 10,000.)  That's for archers, 
druids, clerics, and fire elementals.  (Haven't gotten to the rest of 
the characters yet.)
